education_text.0: Dewar was first Assistant Professor of Information Science and later Associate Professor of Computer Science at the      Illinois Institute of Technology Illinois Institute of Technology (IIT) from 1968 to 1975, before becoming Research Associate Professor of Computer Science at      New York University New York University (NYU) in 1975, where he was Full Professor of Computer Science from 1976 to 2005, and becoming chair of the departmentDewar was first Assistant Professor of Information Science and later Associate Professor of Computer Science at the      Illinois Institute of Technology Illinois Institute of Technology (IIT) from 1968 to 1975, before becoming Research Associate Professor of Computer Science at      New York University New York University (NYU) in 1975, where he was Full Professor of Computer Science from 1976 to 2005, and becoming chair of the departmentDewar was first Assistant Professor of Information Science and later Associate Professor of Computer Science at the      Illinois Institute of Technology Illinois Institute of Technology (IIT) from 1968 to 1975, before becoming Research Associate Professor of Computer Science at      New York University New York University (NYU) in 1975, where he was Full Professor of Computer Science from 1976 to 2005, and becoming chair of the department
